channel.title: How to make account save? [[508]]
channel.description:
Hey guys, Well anyway whenever people get stuff on my serv, after they log out and log in. Its not their anymore. Its like they start over.
I can code 317's, but I have just started coding 508.
The base is RuneHub.
Thanks if you can help :D
